duties_responsibilities.duty: Facilitate resolution of complex research issues, including drug supply and safety.
Assist with budget forecasting and tracking of grant payments.
Serve as Project Manager for all assigned Competitive Programs.
Collaborate with internal and external partners and stakeholders for management of GMG tactics globally.
Adhere to applicable SOPs, written standards, working practices, and implementation guidelines for the Research Collaboration (RC)/IMG process.
Assist with Outcomes Assessment by generating customized ad hoc reports of data points not captured in dashboards.
Work closely with GO to set up the timeline for each Request for Proposal (RFP), develop and execute the communication plan.
Manage the Expert Review Panel: contracting, user access, reviewer instructions, conduct training calls as needed, and schedule review meetings for all competitive grant program types.
Execute collaboration process and ensures collaboration agreement in place for partner-projects/RFPs.
Assist Grant Officer (GO) and key stakeholders with additional activities, as requested.
Work closely with Business Process Owners of RC and IMG SOPs to implement and communicate process updates.
Serve as the overall manager for drug related submissions and queries globally for research grants.

Oversee the user access request process for the Pharmaceutical Medical Grant system- review access requests, determine the appropriate level of access required and work with Business Operations to implement.
Serve as main point of contact within GMG for any Safety related queries that arise related to research.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree and strong experience required, or other relevant degree and extensive experience. Master's Degree in a clinical background a plus.
